name: A Student's Nightmare
description:
Experience the horror of a college students nightmares riddled with incomplete assignments and malfunctioning printers but at least you have cigarettes and noodles to help you through it all. In this game you play as a student running along the rooftops and streets. It features two levels with two different boss fights. Collect power ups as you go that increase speed, jump height and collect cigarettes to take down the bosses.

Controls:

A and D = move left and right

Spacebar = Jump

Left Shift = Throw Cigarette

Esc = Pause Menu

R = Restart prototype

I made this game for a university project when I was still getting used to using unity, so it is less than perfect but it was still lots of fun to make nevertheless.
